content: stretch out your blanket collection with the dachshund blanket this fun striped throw will not only add cozy vibes to any living space but also a cute and long wiener dog design this one-of-a-kind kit is perfect for beginners looking to learn colorwork or more experienced crocheters looking for a simple afghan with a twist step-by-step photos and detailed instructions are included there is a free youtube tutorial available on my channel savannah s stitches there is also a kit available with lion brand this pattern is best suited for advanced beginners the pattern produces a blanket that is 34 5 88cm wide and 48 122cm tall it is worked row-by-row with color changes to create the stripes and weiner/sausage dog the pattern is written in english using us terminology materials * 5mm crochet hook * 1960 total yds 1792 m of aran/worsted/size 4 yarn 860 yds 786m in the background color 1100 yds 1006m in the dog color * scissors * stitch markers * bobbin holders i used bobby pins this pattern is strictly for personal use if you sell products from this pattern please credit me as the designer i used lion brand color theory to make this i recommend using a similar acrylic or wool for your own project
